Package org.thewhitemage13.processor

Class UserProcessorImpl

java.lang.Object
org.thewhitemage13.processor.UserProcessorImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserProcessorInterface
@Component public class UserProcessorImpl extends Object implements UserProcessorInterface
Implementation of UserProcessorInterface for handling user-related processing logic.

This class provides methods to process user creation, convert user entities to various DTOs, and encode sensitive data such as passwords using BCryptPasswordEncoder.

Key Features:

  • Processes user creation and populates user entity fields.
  • Converts user entities to various data transfer objects (DTOs).
  • Encodes passwords for security purposes.

Dependencies:

  • PasswordEncoder for encoding user passwords securely.
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Mukhammed Lolo

  • Method Details

    • userCreateProcessor

      public void userCreateProcessor(CreateUserDTO createUserDTO, User user, String phoneNumber)
      Populates a User entity with data from CreateUserDTO.

      This method encodes the user's password and maps various fields from the DTO to the user entity.

      Specified by:
      userCreateProcessor in interface UserProcessorInterface
      Parameters:
      createUserDTO - the DTO containing user creation data
      user - the User entity to be populated
      phoneNumber - the user's phone number to be set

    • getOpenUserDTO

      public OpenUserDTO getOpenUserDTO(String userName, String profilePictureUrl, List<String> mediaPostsUrl, Long countFollowing, Long countFollowers, Long countPosts)
      Creates an OpenUserDTO with detailed user information.
      Specified by:
      getOpenUserDTO in interface UserProcessorInterface
      Parameters:
      userName - the username of the user
      profilePictureUrl - the URL of the user's profile picture
      mediaPostsUrl - a list of URLs pointing to the user's media posts
      countFollowing - the count of users this user is following
      countFollowers - the count of followers the user has
      countPosts - the count of posts the user has created
      Returns:
      an OpenUserDTO containing the user's public information
